entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 except minus 9 along the Fundy coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 except minus 9 along the Fundy coast. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
